summary: Website/landing page header section for HAND FOR ALL (HOF - Hand For All) prosthetic soft-robotic hand project, including hero content, key features, how-it-works summary, applications, and contact info with specified visual style.
architectural_notes: Visual design: dark charcoal/black background, white text, light blue/cyan accents.
Header content must include: brand name (HAND FOR ALL), logo text (HOF - Hand For All), title, tagline, key features, how-it-works, applications, and contact info.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- 3D wireframe/render of a translucent cyan-blue prosthetic hand showing internal tubing on a dark background (hof-hero-hand.dim_1600x900.png)
- Workshop illustration of a man struggling to lift a box with one hand; industrial workshop environment; dark tone with cyan highlights (hof-usecase-workshop.dim_1400x900.png)
- Photo-like prototype detail: silicone prosthetic hand connected to an air pump with visible tubing and wiring on a neutral/dark surface (hof-prototype-detail.dim_1400x900.png)

existing_features.title: Build a responsive landing page header/hero section for the “HAND FOR ALL” project using the provided copy: brand name “HAND FOR ALL”, logo text “HOF - Hand For All”, main title “Prosthetic Hand Using Soft Robots”, and tagline “Innovating Human Capability with Soft Robotics”.
Add a “Key Features” section displaying the six provided feature items and their descriptions: Natural Movement, Ergonomics, Mechanism, Customization, Impact, Tech Stack (Arduino).
Add a “How It Works” section containing the provided explanation of the air pump + silicone tubes + Arduino control.
Add an “Applications” section listing: Medical Rehab, Assistive Tech, and R&D (Research and Development).
Add a “Contact” section showing the team contact email and both phone numbers exactly as provided.

Apply a consistent visual design across the landing page using the specified palette: dark charcoal/black background, white text, and light blue/cyan accents; choose a coherent typography and layout style that fits a modern soft-robotics/engineering theme (no blue/purple-dominant theme).

Add the specified visual elements to the page using generated static images: (1) hero imagery (3D wireframe/render of a translucent blue prosthetic hand showing internal tubing), (2) use-case illustration (man in a workshop struggling to lift a box with one hand), and (3) component detail (photo-like image of physical prototype with silicone hand connected to an air pump and wiring). Store and serve these as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them directly from the frontend (no backend image serving).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create the website header/hero section for HAND FOR ALL (HOF) including brand/logo text, main title, tagline, key features, how-it-works summary, applications, and contact information, styled with dark background and cyan accents and supported by specified visuals.
